collections.description: TEAM: The Club Atlético Independiente, popularly known as Independiente or Independiente de Avellaneda, was founded on January 1, 1905 in the city of Avellaneda, Buenos Aires. It is one of the most important teams in America thanks to its history. He is the maximum winner of the "Copa Libertadores de America" ​​with 7 won championships. I also won: 3 inter-American cups, 2 intercontinental cups, 2 super cups, 1 South American cup and 2 South American cups.One of the best Teams for live The Experience.How to buy Independiente tickets: Choose your match, choose your host and buy your Independiente experience with Football Host! STADIUM: Libertadores de América stadium, also known as La Doble Visea, has a capacity of 52,823. It was the first cement stadium in america. In the year 2005 they changed their name to "Libertadores de America" because it is the team with most titles in this competition.Get your Libertadores de America tickets and live the best football in Avellaneda.
collections.title: Independiente Tickets & Experiences
collections.descriptionHtml:
TEAM:

The Club Atlético Independiente, popularly known as Independiente or Independiente de Avellaneda, was founded on January 1, 1905 in the city of Avellaneda, Buenos Aires. It is one of the most important teams in America thanks to its history. He is the maximum winner of the "Copa Libertadores de America" ​​with 7 won championships. I also won: 3 inter-American cups, 2 intercontinental cups, 2 super cups, 1 South American cup and 2 South American cups.
One of the best Teams for live The Experience.

How to buy Independiente tickets: Choose your match, choose your host and buy your Independiente experience with Football Host!

STADIUM:

Libertadores de América stadium, also known as La Doble Visea, has a capacity of 52,823. It was the first cement stadium in america. In the year 2005 they changed their name to "Libertadores de America" because it is the team with most titles in this competition.

Get your Libertadores de America tickets and live the best football in Avellaneda.
